subject: I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: J. Paul Reddam, owner of I’ll Have Another, studied philosophy before embarking on a career that includes horse racing and running a business that makes high-risk, high-interest loans.
snippet: J. Paul Reddam, owner of I’ll Have Another, studied philosophy before embarking on a career that includes horse racing and running a business that makes high-risk, high-interest loans.
